thread.section_title: The Bryant Park Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Mid Town Location
thread.title_full: Wonderful Mid Town Location - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: JAC197561000
title: Wonderful Mid Town Location
text: Fabulous location across from the park and library. Convenient to subways, broadway, shopping, times square and restaurants. Rooms are small but quiet & clean. Bathrooms are large with shower and tub. Our shower lacked water pressure and took a while for hot water. Bed was firm with good pillows. Service was outstanding. Staff really hustles.
